isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - MODULATED FAN DRIVE ASSEMBLY; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: MODULATED FAN DRIVE ASSEMBLY; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks, open hood.
Disconnect both A/C line p-clips from shroud if applicable.
Disconnect engine shroud and move towards motor so front of fan can be accessed.
Remove fan hub air line.
Remove fan hub line fitting.
Disconnect both charge air cooler hoses at cooler.
Loosen radiator assembly mount bolts.
Disconnect radiator frame stay rods, include support hood.
Remove fan from clutch and remove fan blade from vehicle.
Remove fan clutch assembly.
Install fan clutch assembly, and torque bolts to spec.
Install fan blade to clutch, and torque bolts to spec.
Install fan hub line fitting.
Install fan hub air line.
Connect radiator frame stay rods.
Tighten radiator core frame support mounting bolts, include remove support hood.
Connect engine shroud to radiator assembly.
Connect both A/C line p-clips to shroud if applicable.
Connect charge air cooler hoses at cooler.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks.
